epic.summary: FWL-EPIC: LoRa Gateway Logger System and Repository Migration
epic.description: Complete implementation of embedded logger system for LoRa Gateway firmware, including GUI tools, UART migration, parameter logging, and repository organization under uqomm organization.

tasks.summary: Implement embedded Logger system for STM32F103
tasks.description: Create Logger.hpp and Logger.cpp with singleton pattern, RS485 output, multiple log levels, and UART3 communication. Includes initialization, message formatting, and hardware abstraction.

tasks.summary: Migrate UART communication from UART1 to UART2
tasks.description: Update main.cpp and related components to use UART2 instead of UART1 for LoRa data and configuration commands. Includes callback updates and handler initialization.

tasks.summary: Integrate Logger system into main firmware
tasks.description: Add logger initialization, heartbeat logging, UART/LoRa communication logging, and error handling integration throughout the main firmware application.

tasks.summary: Add LoRa transmission parameters to heartbeat logging
tasks.description: Enhance Logger::logHeartbeat() to include LoRa transmission parameters (RX/TX frequency, spread factor, coding rate, bandwidth) for better monitoring and debugging.
Develop lora_gui_config.py with 4-tab interface (Connection, Parameters, Advanced, Log), serial communication, parameter validation, and real-time monitoring capabilities.
Transfer repository from personal account to uqomm organization, create fw-gateway1Lora repository, organize project structure, and update documentation.
